title: Bump Coverage
description: Based on the last test report, bump coverage requirements up and commit.

commit.description: Commit the coverage bump if changes were made.

commitMessage.description: Set the commit message, which supports templating.
commitMessage.default: chore(<%= projectName %>): update testing coverage requirements

coverageSummaryPath.description: The path to the coverage summary file E.G. 'coverage/libs/project/coverage-summary.json'

margin.description: The minimal threshold before updating coverage.
